sentences.sentence: This article uses 0.7 megapixel tiles for each component frame.
sentences.translation: 本文为每个组件帧使用 0.7 兆像素的贴片。

sentences.sentence: While the iPhone 4 can shoot HD video, it only has a 5 megapixel camera.
sentences.translation: iPhone也可以拍摄高清视频，但它只配备了500万像素的摄像头。

sentences.sentence: It has a 5-megapixel camera and can shoot and edit high-definition video.
sentences.translation: 它有五百万像素摄像头，可以拍摄及编辑高清录像。
